amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funds for the Army Corps of Engineers, Construction and Operation accounts to the FY 2011 levels by reducing funds for the Nuclear Energy account under the Department of Energy.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funds for the Army Corps of Engineers, Construction and Operation accounts and reduce funds for the Nuclear Energy account under the Department of Energy.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tierney amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 162 - 246 (Roll no. 534).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Tierney amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 162 - 246 (Roll no. 534).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Tierney.
